feed.title: Converse Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Converse: 10.1.4 (2023-06-25)
entry.content: • Fix dist directory not included in NPM package

entry.title: New release for Converse: 10.1.5 (2023-06-29)
entry.content:
• 3209: Fix error when importing the converse global with bootstrap modal API

  • 3207: .po translation files weren't included in previous release

  • Updated Galician and Portuguese translations

entry.title: New release for Converse: 10.1.6 (2023-08-31)
entry.content:
• 3246: Badge color not responsive to dark theme

  • Fix a GIF rendering bug that causes a memory overflow

entry.title: New release for Converse: 10.1.7 (2024-03-15)
entry.content: • Update to Strophe 2.0.0. Fixes login issue with newer versions of Ejabberd

entry.title: New release for Converse: 10.1.8 (2024-12-17)
entry.content:
• 3553 Cannot create a groupchat via the modal

  • Update to the latest Strophe version to fix a security vulnerability with the stx tagged template literal. Converse itself is not vulnerable, since it only uses stx in tests, but it was also exported, so downstream projects might have relied on it.
